question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.
Please answer the following questions. During the THREE MONTHS PRIOR to the onset of the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis in your area:
During the THREE MONTHS PRIOR to the onset of the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis in your area:
… on average, what time did you go to bed on WEEKDAYS?
option_text: Before 9 pm, 9 pm-11 pm, 11 pm-1 am, After 1 am

question_text: … on average, what time did you go to bed on WEEKENDS?
option_text: Before 9 pm, 9 pm-11 pm, 11 pm-1 am, After 1 am

question_text: … on average, how many hours per night did you sleep on WEEKDAYS?
… on average, how many hours per night did you sleep on WEEKENDS?
… how many days per week did you exercise (e.g., increased  heart rate) for at least 30 minutes?
… how many days per week did you spend time outdoors?
During the THREE MONTHS PRIOR to the onset of the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis in your area:
… how worried were you generally?
option_text: Not worried at all, Slightly worried, Moderately worried, Very worried, Extremely worried

question_text: … how happy versus sad were you?
option_text: Vert sad/depressed/unhappy, Moderately sad/depressed/unhappy, Neutral, Moderately happy/cheerful, Very happy/cheerful

question_text: …  how much were you able to enjoy your usual activities?
option_text: Not at all, Slightly, Moderately,Very much, A lot

question_text: … how relaxed versus anxious were you?
option_text: Very relaxed/calm, Moderately relaxed/calm, Neutral, Moderately nervous/anxious, Very nervous/anxious

question_text: … how fidgety or restless were you?
option_text: Not fidgety/restless at all, Slightly fidgety/restless, Moderately fidgety/restless, Very fidgety/restless, Extremely fidgety/restless

question_text: … how fatigued or tired were you?
option_text: Not fatigued or tired at all, Slightly fatigued or tired , Moderately fatigued or tired, Vary fatigued or tired, Extremely fatigued or tired

question_text: …  how well were you able to concentrate or focus?
option_text: Very focused/attentive, Moderately focused/ attentive, Neutral, Moderately unfocused/distracted, Very unfocused/distracted

question_text: …  how irritable or easily angered were you?
option_text: Not irritable or easily angered at all, Slightly irritable or easily angered, Moderately irritable or easily angered, Very irritable or easily angered, Extremely irritable or easily angered

question_text: … how lonely were you?
option_text: Not lonely at all, Slightly loneley, Moderately loneley, Very lonely, Extremely lonely

question_text: … to what extent did you have negative thoughts, thoughts about unpleasant experiences or things that made you feel bad?
option_text: Not at all, Rarely, Occasionally, Often, A lot of the time

question_text: During the THREE MONTHS PRIOR to the onset of the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis in your area:
… how much time per day did you spend watching TV or digital media (e.g., Netflix, YouTube, web surfing)?
option_text: No TV or digital media, Under 1 hour, 1-3 hours, 4-6 hours, More than 6 hours

question_text: … how much time per day did you spend using social media (e.g., Facetime, Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, Twitter, TikTok)?
option_text: No social media, Under 1 hour, 1-3 hours, 4-6 hours, More than 6 hours

question_text: … how much time per day did you spend, playing video games?
option_text: No video games, Under 1 hour, 1-3 hours, 4-6 hours, More than 6 hours

question_text: Congratulations for completing this survey! Press finish to continue.
